DataElement.preferredName: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index Assessment Performed Total Integer::0 Decimal Place Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value related to the total score of the Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index Assessment Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A clinical index for the measurement of disease activity in systemic lupus erythematosus. The index utilizes 24 weighted variables that measure disease activity, damage from disease, and health status._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical index for the measurement of disease activity in systemic lupus erythematosus. The index utilizes 24 weighted variables that measure disease activity, damage from disease, and health status.

Concepts.longName: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Disease Activity Index
Concepts.definition: A clinical index for the measurement of disease activity in systemic lupus erythematosus. The index utilizes 24 weighted variables that measure disease activity, damage from disease, and health status.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.:Performed; carried out.

Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::0_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.[Manually curated]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number with no fractional part.::0:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
